name: REWRAP
description: This command will re-word wrap a field that has been previously set up with the WRAP command.

parameters.name: starting_line_number
parameters.description: starting_line_number - f/c/e - Required - The line number at which to start the word wrap

comments: By starting at a different line than the first you can speed up the word wrap process. Also, the program already knows what the field is, where itâ€™s located, and has done all the preliminary work which also speeds up the process.
